derivation: by contraction from an unused root meaning to gather;
outline:
1. also, even, indeed, moreover, yea
    1. also, moreover (giving emphasis)
    2. neither, neither...nor (with negative)
    3. even (for stress)
    4. indeed, yea (introducing climax)
    5. also (of correspondence or retribution)
    6. but, yet, though (adversative)
    7. even, yea, yea though (with 'when' in hypothetical case)
  2. (TWOT) again, alike
kjv_def: again, alike, also, (so much) as (soon), both (so)...and, but, either...or, even, for all, (in) likewise (manner), moreover, nay...neither, one, then(-refore), though, what, with, yea.
strongs_def: properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and
